Recently, the traditional scarf-wrapping technique
of kistan women has been
awarded the title of cultural heritage by Unesco.
intangible of
humanity, kistan women often wear a
white head scarf called El. After getting
married, they leave their parents' house to go to their
husband's house. It symbolizes their age and
status in society.  Currently
traditional and opaque, the white color
symbolizes the mother's love life. El is the
national head scarf of the
Kistan nomads, usually older people will
wrap the scarf in many layers to look larger but have few
accessories. Rich people often have accessories.  In the
past, women could wrap their own
scarves every day, but when there were special events or
festivals, they would take the time to
hand wash and iron them carefully afterward. Prepare a
tea party and invite experienced women to
come and spend time.  all day to wrap towels
for yourself. El is now more popular and easier to find.
People can buy pre-wrapped graves
at local markets. In recent years, the
Kistan Ministry of Culture and the K organization have
actively promoted and spread the word.
This costume is intended to preserve and promote national identity

fire broke out this morning in a
six-story house on Doc Lap Street,
Tan Quy Ward, Tan
Phu District. According to initial information around 9:00
this morning, people discovered smoke coming
from the first floor.  In the two houses mentioned above, many people
inside ran out in panic to receive
news that the
fire prevention and rescue police team of Tan Phu district police
had mobilized many vehicles and
officers and soldiers to the scene.
The authorities have blocked a
part of the independent road passing through the
house where the fire occurred to fight the fire.
Firefighters use a ladder nearly 20 meters high to bring three
people standing in the house to the ground and put out the fire
burning at the cranes.  After about 30
minutes, the fire was extinguished without
causing any casualties, but it destroyed many
properties and goods. People said that the
house was on fire,
but the cause and damage from the fire are being
investigated.  This afternoon, a container truck traveling
on Highway 1, passing through District 12,
Ho Chi Minh City, pulled down the
Long Mon rack frame, causing the iron frame to collide with a
bus running on the
road. At more than 12:15 this afternoon, a
container truck was driving.  On Highway 1 heading from
An Xuong to Nga intersection, when the vehicle was
about 200 meters from the Quang Trung overpass, Dong Hung Thuan Ward, District 12, the
container collided with the
Long Mon rack frame with a traffic sign
across the road.  The accident caused the Long Mon rack frame
to collapse and hit bus number 24, traveling in the
same direction. At the scene, the rack frame
fell on the bus tractor, shattered the
windshield of the cabin, and seriously damaged more than 10
passengers and the flight attendant driver.  The
bus was in a panic, luckily no one was injured. The
accident caused traffic
on Highway 1 from District 12 to
Thu Duc city to be congested for a long time. An
Xuong traffic police team and District 12 police
arrived to handle it.  scene and investigation of the
cause of the
accident late last night. A traffic accident
between a motorbike and a car

My Ward, Cai Le Town, Tien Giang Province,

According to people who witnessed the
